subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Allen Iverson, Carmelo Anthony and Kobe Bryant know that a scoring title can be a dubious distinction. Since 2000, only one player led the league in scoring and won an N.B.A. title in the same season.
snippet: Allen Iverson, Carmelo Anthony and Kobe Bryant know that a scoring title can be a dubious distinction. Since 2000, only one player led the league in scoring and won an N.B.A. title in the same season.
